hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors
# step 1: generate main DwCA resource ###php resource_utility.php jenkins '{"resource_id": "24_pre_ENV", "task": "remove_MoF_Occurrence"}' # source is 24_legacy_2024_11_15_EoL.tar.gz # generates 24_pre_ENV.tar.gz
#exit 0
# Available subjects for AntWeb: Description|Distribution|DiagnosticDescription|TaxonBiology #http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Description: 17216 #http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution: 2992 #http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#DiagnosticDescription: 303 --- issue with "concave", hasn't solved yet #http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#TaxonBiology: 122 ---
# step 2: start textmine ###php environments_2_eol.php jenkins '{"task": "generate_eol_tags_pensoft", "resource":"all_BHL", "resource_id":"AntWeb", "subjects":"Description|Distribution|TaxonBiology"}' #source is 24_pre_ENV.tar.gz #generates AntWeb_ENV.tar.gz
#exit 0
# step 3: Clade Specific Filters for Habitat. The 1st filter. ###php clade_filters_4_habitats.php jenkins '{"resource_id":"AntWeb_ENV"}' #OK | result taxon.tab will be only those with occurrences, media, etc. #source is AntWeb_ENV.tar.gz #generates AntWeb_ENV_2.tar.gz
# step 4: remove all MoF records with habitat value(s) that are descendants of both marine and terrestrial OK. The 2nd filter. ###php rem_marine_terr_desc.php _ '{"resource_id":"AntWeb_ENV_2"}' #source is AntWeb_ENV_2 #generates AntWeb_ENV_3
#exit 0
### === LAST STEP: cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/applications/content_server/resources_3 cp AntWeb_ENV_3.tar.gz AntWeb_textmined.tar.gz ls -lt AntWeb_ENV_3.tar.gz ls -lt AntWeb_textmined.tar.gz ### then delete AntWeb_ENV_3.tar.gz rm -f AntWeb_ENV_3.tar.gz
